name: Chaos - My Sleep Paralysis Demon
description:
Fullscreen recommended. Please use fullscreen for best experience.

Summary:
Tim has been having nightmares. His alter ego, Chaos, has been forcing him to fight himself. On this particular night he is out camping with his partner. But little does Tim know that when he goes to bed he will be able to finally get rid of Chaos.

Controls:
W A S D - to move
Mouse + click - to point weapon and attack
Enter - continue dialogue

Your goal:
 Defeat the hoards made by Chaos

"FeAtUrEs":
The game was made rather quickly so it's a bit buggy. Notable features include:
*enemies holding spears the wrong way
*UI messed up
*Ending dialogue ends abruptly.
It's 4AM now XD and I want to sleep, so they will stay.
